channel.title: Premium on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Premium on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Front Door Premium now supports Azure Private Link origins in UAE North
item.description:
Azure Front Door Premium (public preview) now supports configuring Azure Private Link-enabled origins in the UAE North region.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Geo-Replication for Azure Service Bus Premium
item.description:
Geo-Replication for Azure Service Bus Premium is now generally available, offering replication as an option to help insulate Service Bus applications against outages and disasters.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Announcing: API Center Standard now included at no additional cost for linked Azure API Management Standard and Premium tiers
item.description:
Microsoft announced that API Center Standard, previously a separately billed offering, is now included at no additional cost for Azure API Management Standard and Premium customers when an API Center instance is linked to the corresponding API Management service.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Vaulted backup for Azure Files (Premium)
item.description:
Azure Backup now offers generally available vaulted backups for Azure Files premium shares, providing vault-based protection to help ensure business continuity and compliance.

  • Source: Azure Updates
